head.title: Home - McGregor Independent School District #4

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

p.span: The search for the new McGregor superintendent/elementary principal is moving along. The McGregor School Board has selected three candidates for the firs-round interviews on Saturday, April 25.

Due to the Governor’s Executive Order, the interviews will be held electronically via Zoom and be streamed live online here . This will still allow those community and staff members who are able to watch all three of the interviews and provide feedback for the school board members before the deliberations occur. Each feedback form must be completed prior to the next interview and the school board’s deliberation. The feedback form will be available online here.

Again, while all community and staff members are welcome to view these livestreams of the school board’s interviews, only those that can listen to all three sessions will be able to provide feedback. This is done to ensure that there is a fair process for all the candidates involved.
The current timeline for the interviews on April 25 is as follows:
Thank you for your interest in the McGregor Superintendent search.

p.span: McGregor school believes staff, parent and community partnerships are the key to suc

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: justify; font-size: 14px; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: cess. We believe in a high quality educational system in a supportive learning environment. McGregor has a long standing tradition of excellence that is consistent with a growing district. Academics and activities help develop a well rounded student, best preparing them for the future. Staff help all learners develop skill sets and attitudes necessary to lead productive and successful lives. McGregor supports all students for future success.
